rows.label: qst710901_msg0001
rows.name:
The war with Shiya...
Metsu's attack... What
will happen to Superbia now?

rows.label: qst710901_msg0002
rows.name:
No, no! How can we, the soldiers
of the Superbian army, who are His
Majesty's vanguard, lose heart!

rows.label: qst710901_msg0003
rows.name:
It is precisely at times like
these that each and every one of
us is required to be strong...

rows.label: qst710901_msg0004
rows.name:
...Whoa! H-how long have
you all been there?!

rows.label: qst710901_msg0005
rows.name: Hmm? You ask why strength is required?

rows.label: qst710901_msg0006
rows.name:
That's simple. The strong prosper,
and the weak are plundered...

rows.label: qst710901_msg0007
rows.name: That is the truth of Alst today.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0008
rows.name:
That's why one day, I want to
become a soldier strong enough
to protect His Majesty Hugo...

rows.label: qst710901_msg0009
rows.name:
No, strong enough to protect
the entire nation of Superbia,
even by myself.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0010
rows.name:
Even against an opponent like
Metsu, the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0012
rows.name: Would you have a match with me?

rows.label: qst710901_msg0013
rows.name:
Of course, you can all come at
me with everything you've got.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0014
rows.name:
If it's not at that level, I
don't think I can defeat the
Heaven's Holy Grail by myself.

rows.label: qst710901_msg0015
rows.name:
However, I too am known as the
best sniper in the Superbian army.
I don't intend to lose easily.
